Column.Name: Function Enabled
Column.DefaultValueFormula: ARRAY( TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, TRUE )

Column.Name: Register Enabled
Register Setup Enabled
Column.Formula: IF( [Register]#[LineNumber] = NULL, NULL, [Register Setup Required]#[LineNumber]= TRUE, TRUE, [Register Setup Enabled]#[LineNumber] )

Column.Name: Second Party
Column.ValidationFormula: IF( LEN($thisValue) > 14, "Second party name must be 14 characters or fewer" )

Column.Name: Parent Structure
Enabled Registers
Enabled Blocks
Display Data
Column.DefaultValueFormula:
HASH( "Overview Blocks", HASH( "Duration Summary", HASH("DisplayName", "Duration", "Description", "Displays a collection of key dates for the contract. Also displays the set of extensions. If the specific contract is set to perpetual then extensions will not be visible."),
"Simple Value Summary", HASH("DisplayName", "Simplified Value", "Description", "A simplified view of the value information which has a basic table that displays the intial and current value of the contract along side the value variations and extensions. "),
"Value Summary", HASH("DisplayName", "Value", "Description", "Includes everything from the simplified Value view, but adds inputs for Budget, Expenditure to Date, Expenditure Type and Indexation Type."),
"Contract Events", HASH("DisplayName", "Contract Events", "Description", "A table that pulls together all key events related to the contract and arranges them in order of date."),
"Procurement Details", HASH("DisplayName", "RFx Details", "Description", "Displays reference numbers and links off to the market request or procurement plan associated with the contract if present. Has a notes area to capture manual detail related to the RFx."),
"Related Records", HASH("DisplayName", "Related Records", "Description", "Area to display and manage which contracts that relate to this contract. Relations are applied manually and can be seen on both ends of the relationship."),
"Variations", HASH("DisplayName", "Variations", "Description", "Option to display list of variations in the overview area of the contract to make them more visible.") ) )

Column.Name: Enabled Functions
Profile Register Enabled
Profile Register
Column.DefaultValueFormula:
LET $data := DB_LOOKUP( "Profile Supported Registers", "Settings - Contract", HASH("RecordID", 1, "LineNumber", 1) );
RETURN $data

Column.Name: Global Settings
Additional Setup Information
Enabled Additional Setup Information

Label.Text: Term used for the second party of the contract
Prefix (Applicable when 'contract type' is required as part of 'Contract number')

Binding.Expression:
LET $set := ARRAY( "Setup", IF( [Preparation Stage Required] = TRUE, "Preparation"), "Management" );
RETURN ARRAY_WHERE($set, $(i, item) $item <> NULL)

Label.Text: Set which information is required to be input during the contract setup process.
You may specify which additional information is able to be added during the setup process.
Toggle registers from the list below. The items switched on will be available for Contracts of this Contract Type

Binding.Expression: AND( OR( HASH_GET([Global Settings], "Contracts Profile") = "Advanced Contracts", HASH_GET([Global Settings], "Contracts Profile") = NULL ), [Navigation] = "Management" )

Label.Text: Toggle registers from the list below. The items switched on will be available for Contracts of this Contract Type

Binding.Expression: AND( AND( HASH_GET([Global Settings], "Contracts Profile") <> NULL, HASH_GET([Global Settings], "Contracts Profile") <> "Advanced Contracts" ), [Navigation] = "Management" )

FieldEntry.Formula:
ARRAY_SELECT( EACH [Block], $(i, item) IF( $item = "Simple Value Summary", //do not enable both value summary blocks FALSE,
TRUE ) )

Label.Text: Tailor which sub-areas are available from on the overview tab on Contract records.

FieldEntry.LineNumberFormula:
IF( [Block] = "Value Summary", ARRAY_INDEXOF(EACH [Block], "Simple Value Summary"),
[Block] = "Simple Value Summary", ARRAY_INDEXOF(EACH [Block], "Value Summary") )

FormulaCriterion.Formula: AND( [Block Enabled]#[LineNumber] = TRUE, OR( [Block]#[LineNumber] = "Simple Value Summary", [Block]#[LineNumber] = "Value Summary" ) )

Binding.Expression:
"
" & HASH_GET( HASH_GET( HASH_GET([Display Data], "Overview Blocks"), [Block] ), "DisplayName" ) & "
"

"
" & HASH_GET( HASH_GET( HASH_GET([Display Data], "Overview Blocks"), [Block] ), "Description" ) & "
"

CheckBox.Text: Is the Vendor tab available - provides a dedicated area for information about the vendor related to the contract.

Block.HeadingText: Click here to delete this record

Label.Text: The items enabled will be available for Contracts of this Contract Type in Preparation stage

FieldEntry.Formula: IF( [Wizard - Vendor Exists] = TRUE, FALSE, TRUE )

ChangeFieldValues.Description: Set other checkbox to false (only 1 can be ticked)

FieldEntry.Formula:
LET $hash:= HASH( "Clauses", "Add Clauses", "Contract Review", "Add Contract Review", "Communication", "Log Communication", "Extensions", "Add Extensions", "Issues", "Log Issues", "Key Performance Indicators", "Add KPIs", "Meetings", "Add Meetings", "Milestones", "Add Milestones", "Funding Sources", "Add Funding Sources", "Funding Recipients", "Add Funding Recipients", "Payment Certificates", "Add Payment Certificates", "Purchase Orders", "Add Purchase Orders", "Request for Information", "Request for Information", "File notes", "Add File notes", "Risks", "Add Risks", "Lessons Learnt", "Log Lessons Learnt", "Work Orders", "Add Work Orders", "Defects Liability", "Add Defect Liability", "Novation", "Add Novation", "Penalty Clauses", "Add Penalty Clauses", "Security", "Add Security", "Service Level Agreements", "Add Service Level Agreements", "Transition", "Add Transition", "Variations", "Add Variations", "Warranties", "Add Warranties", "Termination", "Terminate", "Custom Reminders", "Add Custom Reminders", "Actions", "Add Actions", "Vendor Insurance", "Add Vendor Insurance", "Vendor Contact", "Add Vendor Contact" );
RETURN ARRAY_SELECT( ARRAY_INDEX(ARRAY_TRANSPOSE([Temp]), 1), // Register $(i,item) HASH_GET($hash, $item) )
